msgSnippet: I would prefer to put it under the same package in different source folder. What is the drive behind not using the same package? Cheers, Veny ... From: Mark Xu

I would prefer to put it under the same package in different source folder.
What is the drive behind not using the same package?

Cheers,

Veny

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Xu [mailto:xudianm@...]
Sent: Friday, January 30, 2004 12:29 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] your opinion needed: package for unit testing codes


should it be the same as the packge for the source
codes been tested or not?

my colleagues argued that it makes it easy to test
the protected methods or packge scope methods if
they live in the same package.

thanks,
Mark
